value:
There are so many delightful Heroes
here. Princes, princesses, knights—
and all so well-dressed!

As Princess Céline's retainer, I feel
compelled to protect her at any cost.
I'm sure you understand what I mean.

If you're tired, some fried snake eyes
should pep you right up. Oh, do they
not make those here?

Hmm...who would look best standing
by your side! Oh, I know! How about
the Hero you summoned last?

Your divine weapon is so lovely. Not
even my long-distance throwing
compares to shooting shining orbs!

This castle reminds me of a fairy tale!
You should go and take a look at
$Nf's castle too.

Like the moment of triumph at the
end of a fairy tale!

I should treat myself to something
tasty after all this hard work!

Sorry about that. It's hard to focus
when I'm hungry...

You're giving this to me? Oh, I'm so
happy! Thank you very much!

I am Chloé, a royal knight of Firene.
This place is beautiful! I think it would
suit Princess Céline perfectly.

Oh, I'm so sorry! Was I staring at
you again, $Nu?$k$pI didn't mean anything by it. I just
think you look picturesque in the
company of all these Heroes.$k$pHm? You want me to be the one to
keep you company today? Sure!
That sounds great!$k$pSpending time with you always feels
like I'm getting a chance to take part
in something magical.$k$pSo, what should we do? Do you want
to go looking for folk food? I'd love to
see you try something unique!
It's teatime!
I'm ready to dig in!
A happy ending.
How picturesque.
So this is how my story ends…
I'm glad I was summoned by such a charming person.
Oh? No need to make conversation. I'm content to stand here and daydream.
Is there a folk-food stall around here? I want to know what unique things people eat in this world.
The Order of Heroes is altogether picturesque. The scenery, the Heroes... Together, they make for a charming sight!
You look just like a fairy-tale hero! If you stood next to a spirit or a prince, that would really complete the picture.
What I would do for a bite of grilled gecko, deep-fried snake, or... Oh! Sautéed fish eyeballs!
Being here, supporting you, I almost feel like an Emblem... I hope you know I'll always fight to protect my allies, whoever they are.
How lovely.
Say the word.
Whatever you ask.
